places.name: Founders Brewing Co.
places.notes: Great craft beer and live music on certain nights. It is a very popular spot, but has a large outdoor area.
places.parking: Street parking available, and a parking lot is nearby that can validate 1 hour of parking.
places.address: Market Avenue Southwest, Grand Rapids, Kent County, Michigan, 49503, United States

places.name: Brewery Vivant
places.notes: A brewery located in a former funeral home, known for its Belgian-style beers and farm-to-table food.
places.address: 925 Cherry St SE, Grand Rapids, MI 49506

places.name: The Mitten Brewing Co.
places.notes: A brewery located in a former firehouse, known for its craft beers and pizza. Recommendation: Get a pizza flight. You get to try many types of pizza and it feeds 3 people at a minimum.
places.address: 527 Leonard St NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

places.name: Long Road Distillers
places.notes: A distillery with a focus on craft spirits. Recommendation: try their cherry liqueur. They offer tours on Saturdays for $10 that includes a tasting - but you have to book in advance.
places.address: 537 Leonard St NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

places.name: City Built Brewing Company
places.notes: A brewery with a focus on Latin-inspired beers and food.
places.address: 820 Monroe Ave NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49503

places.name: Harmony Brewing Company
places.notes: A brewery known for its community-focused atmosphere and a variety of craft beers.They have a great outdoor seating area and host a euchre night on Mondays
places.address: 1551 Lake Dr SE, Grand Rapids, MI 49506

places.name: Speciation Brewing Company
places.notes: A very good brewery featuring a wide variety of SOURS, Lagers, and Pale Ales. They do not serve food, but they do allow you to bring your own.
places.address: 928 Wealthy St SE, Grand Rapids, MI 49506

places.name: Atwater Brewing
places.notes: Detroit-based brewery with a full kitchen, offering pub fare and a wide selection of craft beers. Spacious, with river views and a lively atmosphere.
places.parking: Street parking and nearby lots available.
places.address: 201 Michigan St NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49503

places.name: Perrin Brewing Company
places.notes: A brewery with great beers - probably the best in the area. But it's a bit out of the way from downtown. Worth the drive if you need to run errands in the area.
places.address: 5910 Comstock Park Dr NW, Comstock Park, MI 49321

places.name: New Holland Brewing - The Knickerbocker
places.notes: A big brewery with some great beers and seltzers. The food is good, but can be pricey.
places.address: 417 Bridge St NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

places.name: Kusterer Brauhaus
places.notes: A German-style brewery with a cozy atmosphere and a variety of beers.
places.address: 642 Bridge St NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504

places.name: Rapid River Stillhouse
places.notes: A distillery and brewery offering a unique selection of spirits and beers. Known for its craft cocktails and small-batch brews.
places.address: 401 Stocking Ave NW, Grand Rapids, MI 49504
